summary: Monthly expenditure tracker with category-wise expense tracking, detailed bifurcation, and savings calculation from total earnings
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Financial growth illustration showing upward trend with coins or savings concept in warm tones (financial-growth.dim_400x300.png)
- Category icons set including food, transport, entertainment, utilities, and shopping in a cohesive style (category-icons.dim_200x200.png)

existing_features.title: Create a frontend form to add new expense entries with fields for amount, category, description, and date
Create a frontend form to set or update monthly earnings for a specific month and year
Create a frontend dashboard displaying category-wise expense breakdown for the selected month, showing each category with its total amount and percentage of total expenses
Create a frontend summary section displaying total earnings, total expenses, and calculated savings for the selected month
Create a frontend list view displaying all individual expense entries for the selected month with options to edit or delete each entry
Implement month and year selector in the frontend to allow users to view data for different months

Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, approachable colors (such as earthy tones or soft gradients), clean typography with good hierarchy for numbers and categories, and a card-based layout that separates summary metrics, category breakdown, and expense details into distinct, scannable sections
Display generated images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated in the appropriate UI locations

new_feature_requests.summary: Calculate and display savings from total earnings
Create a backend data model to store expense entries with fields: id, amount, category, description, date, and timestamp
Create a backend data model to store monthly earnings with fields: id, amount, month, year, and timestamp
Implement backend functions to add, update, delete, and retrieve expense entries
Implement backend functions to set and retrieve monthly earnings
Implement backend function to calculate total expenses by category for a given month and year
Implement backend function to calculate savings as the difference between monthly earnings and total expenses for a given month and year
